Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.ports

Ports for the ping pong example.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PingPongDataInboundPort
    The class PingPongDataInboundPort Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-03-19
    PingPongDataOutboundPort
    The class PingPongDataOutboundPort Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-03-19
    PingPongDataTwoWayPort
    The class PingPongDataTwoWayPort implements the methods send of the DataTwoWayI.PushI interface, but throws an exception for the method request of the DataTwoWayI.PullI interface.
    PingPongInboundPort
    The class PingPongInboundPort implements an inbound port for the PingPongI interface.
    PingPongOutboundPort
    The class PingPongOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the PingPongI interface.
    PingPongTwoWayPort
    The class PingPongTwoWayPort implements the two way port for the PingPongI interface.
    PingPongTwoWayPort.PingPongOutProxy
    The class OutProxy implements an object that forwards calls through the interface PingPongTwoWayI to the other peer component.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.ports Description

Ports for the ping pong example.
